name: WestNileVirusInfectionTestsForWestNileVirusIgMAntibody
title: West Nile Virus Infection (Tests for West Nile virus IgM Antibody)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of West Nile Virus IgM),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: West Nile virus IgM Ab;

VSAC query: 	
West Nile virus IgM Ab or 	
West Nile virus IgG+IgM Ab),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
